name: Desert Ball
description:
This game is heavily inspired by a minigame from Pureya by Majorariatto. It's an infinity runner with some not very original game mechanics but fun!

Controls

  • Left/Right arrow - Move
  • X - Restart game
  • C - Change screen mode

(Use X + C + Down Arrow to reset highscore)

Music Credits

Musical composition by Robby Duguay. Taken from "9 songs in PICO-8".
